name: Mafia Dogs: Furious Road
description:
Pick your favorite car and begin your woof-tastic race. Feel the thrill of furious roads through the famous cities. Collect boosters, speed up yourself, slow down other cars and win the race! No traffic, no police to chase you, it's only you and your rivals.

FEATURES:
- 5 Different types of cars
- 3 Colourful maps
- 5 Cool boosters.
- Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or gyroscope
- Checkpoints, jump ramps, road gaps, tunnels
- Cute sounds and music
- Fun graphics
- Goofy drivers

Racing had never been so fun!
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
